lessons.japanese: あんなやつを負かすのはお茶の子さいさいだ。
lessons.english: I can beat him hands down.

lessons.japanese: あなたは次の選挙で彼を負かすでしょう。
lessons.english: You will get the better of him in the next election.

lessons.japanese: 彼を打ち負かすのは不可能だ。
彼は敵を打ち負かすのに全力を尽くした。
lessons.english: He did his best to overcome his enemy.

lessons.japanese: 私は英語で彼を負かすのは不可能だとわかった。
lessons.english: I found it impossible to beat him at English.

lessons.japanese: 私たちが彼を負かすのは不可能だと思う。
lessons.english: I think it impossible for us to beat him.

lessons.japanese: 私たちが彼を負かすのは不可能だと思う。
lessons.english: I think it's impossible for us to beat him.

lessons.japanese: あんなやつを負かすのはお茶の子さいさいだ。
lessons.english: I can beat him hands down.

lessons.japanese: あなたは次の選挙で彼を負かすでしょう。
lessons.english: You will get the better of him in the next election.

lessons.japanese: 私たちが彼を負かすのは不可能だと思う。
lessons.english: I think it impossible for us to beat him.

lessons.japanese: 私は英語で彼を負かすのは不可能だとわかった。
lessons.english: I found it impossible to beat him at English.

lessons.japanese: 彼を打ち負かすのは不可能だ。
彼は敵を打ち負かすのに全力を尽くした。
lessons.english: He did his best to overcome his enemy.
